${ModID}:ValorForm.NAME: Valor Form
DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain #b1 temporary #yStrength.

${ModID}:WisdomForm.NAME: Wisdom Form
DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an #yAttack card, add #b1 #yDeflect to your hand.

${ModID}:MasterForm.NAME: Master Form
DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain #b1 temporary #yStrength. If it's an an #yAttack card, add #b1 #yDeflect to your hand. NL Costs #b6 #yDrive #yPoints per turn.

${ModID}:FinalForm.NAME: Final Form
DESCRIPTION: Gain #b4 #yThorns, gain half #yDrive #yPoints. NL Choose any number of cards to #yRetain. NL Whenever you play a card, gain #b1 temporary #yStrength. If it's an an #yAttack card, add #b1 #yDeflect to your hand. NL Costs #b10 #yDrive #yPoints per turn.

${ModID}:AntiForm.NAME: Anti Form
DESCRIPTION: Gain 6 #yStrength. NL At the beginning of each turn gain #yHades #yCurse. NL You are stuck in this form until the end of combat.
